Articles.Content: When the game is loaded with Kopernicus  , the screen goes black. my ksp version is 1.7

Despite removing all other mods, I'm having this same problem too. I get the error message "kopernicus was not able to load custom planetary systemsdue to an exception in the loading process", and a blank loading screen when starting.

Could we get your log files please and picture of your GameData folder? Otherwise, there isn't much we can do as we don't know the exact cause of the problem. When you mean there's a black screen after loading, is that before the main menu, space center or launching? And do you get any error messages on the screen or is it just black?

Edited May 5, 2019 by Heirloom

Kopernicus is a version locked mod. Make sure you have completely deleted the older versions of Kopernicus if those were installed, AND make sure your KSP install is not corrupt. If that is the case and you still get a black screen than you should notify Thomas on the kopernicus forum post down below
